id: 17 Posts For Anyone Whose New Favorite Character Is Madam Satan From "Chilling Adventures Of Sabrina"
paragraph:
"Should I hate Madam Satan because I actually don't?!"
        madam satan can step on me anytime #CAOSMadam Satan when Sabrina’s friends still like her spite all her plottingWardell everytime Sabrina does literally anything: #CAOSme after a scene with zelda and madam satan ends:should i hate madam satan because i actually don’tget someone who looks at you the way madam satan looks at zelda spellmanJust a demon struggling to find her straw. 🤣no one talk to me unless it’s about madam satan/michelle gomez please and thank you #sabrina #CAOShail MADAM satan, am i right?Great!
